ModMetaData.name: Hay is Kibble
ModMetaData.author: Horologium
ModMetaData.description: This mod is very simple: It adds an alternate version of kibble that can be made using hay only, at the cost of needing more resources. You can only make this kibble at a full butcher table, not the butchering spot. This mod should not be incompatible with anything. You can add it to any save but do not remove it from an existing save.
